snippet.title: Paddle Paddle Paddle Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
8 days ago, I started to develope a coop paddle game as a fun experiment. I got the Paddle-Coop Idea when I took a shower and it turned into a very fun little project already.

If you like this little Game, please feel free to wishlist the Game on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3570070/Paddle_Paddle_Paddle/

The whole game will be developed and released within a single month since I really want to try this challenge and make a fun small game here without overscoping my Goal. I plan to release a Steam Demo next week too that you can try out my small (30-40 minutes) Demo Area.

If you want to help me on this Paddle Journey, feel free to send this Trailer to friends or Streamers who could enjoy it. Thank you and have a great day!

Some hashtags (just ignore them):
